titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the anniversary meeting of the Dorset-shire gentlemen in the Church of St. Mary-le-Bow. Dec. 1. 1691. By Tho. Lindesay, A.M. Fellow of Wadham Colledge in Oxon; and Chaplain to the Right Honourable the Earl of Essex.
titleStmt.author: Lindesay, Thomas, 1656-1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Miller, at the Rose at the west-end of St. Paul's Church,

notesStmt.note: With an imprimatur on the verso of A1 signed and dated: Geo. Royse, Decemb. 14. 91.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
